President Trump is calling for civility in light of pipe bombs being sent to his political enemies but as NPR's Tamara Keith reports Trump is not let up on his attacks on the media
President Trump told a rally crowd he wants all sides to come together in peace and harmony but not even twelve hours later he tweeted out blame to the media
Quote a very big part of the anger we see today in our society is caused by the purposely false an inaccurate reporting of the mainstream media that I referred to as fake news

Years ago as seen from earth a star in a distant galaxy suffered a violent death
It was pulled apart by a black hole
As the star was ripped to shreds it produced an outburst of X rays over the following decade it's slowly cooled and faded it's raw numbers have seen this scenario play out dozens of times but this one was special
It may have been created by a middle await black hole at times it's rarely seen
Earlier events were powered by super massive black holes
Their millions or billions of times as heavy as the sun and they're found in the hearts of most galaxies in October of two thousand three though X ray telescopes in space noted a brilliant flare in a remote galaxy the flare came from the galaxies edge nodded center
From its brightness temperature and the way it faded astronomers estimated the half of the disrupting black hole about fifty thousand times the mass of the sun
So far astronomers have found only a few dozen good candidates for this class of black holes they're important though because they could be the seeds from which bigger black holes grow to understand that process astronomers need to see a lot of these middle weights but they're tough to find
This was the first possible detection made through the disruption of star
But it suggests that many other middle ... black holes could be sitting quietly waiting for unlucky stars to point
